short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps monitor and warn about swear words in speech

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Language Police is a Chrome extension that keeps hearing the user, and whenever the user swears (saying a bad word), it shows in the current tab a warning message with the word "Language!".
The main objective of this extension is to be used by any users that want to police themselves on swearing less during meetings.
This is especially useful for parents with small kids at home or people who wants to stop using bad words too often and wants to be warned when they do it.
Note: The app doesn't collect/store any information about the user, and it's intended just to warn the users when specific words are captured.
